name: WebSphere_Application_Deployment_Template.
description: This template will deploy a WebSphere Application to an existing WebSphere Installation.

metadata.longDescription: Deploy an EAR or WAR file to a target WebSphere installation. The WebSphere Installation must have a running Admin Application. Target the node and profile with the running admin application, eg, the DMGR or server1.

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description: The admin server must be running and the soap.client.props file must contain the admin credentials for WebSphere
